jsst.title: Jack's Server Side Tweaks
jsst.config.portableCrafting.description: Allows users to use a crafting table in their hand instead of needing to place it.
jsst.config.portableCrafting.itemIdOrTag: Can either be a raw item ID or an item tag prefix with a hashtag '#'.
jsst.config.campfireTimers.description: Shows progress bars above items on a campfire.
jsst.config.itemNudging.shiftUp.descript: Whether block drops will be moved upwards a small amount. This is enough to always pick it up when mined from above.
jsst.config.itemNudging.shiftTowardsPlay: Whether block drops will be moved towards the player that mined them.
